armour.name: Breakneck Robe
armour.description: Prepare yourself for learning the ways of Martial Arts combat. Channel your weapon's attack damage through your hands and feet in a double melee attack! No element resistances with average defense bonuses.

ATTACK.Notes: Each round you attack you take 2 damage (hence the "Breakneck" part of the name).

OTHER.Notes: While worn your weapon and shield aren't shown.
